attributes.additional_details:
"Is This True?"
The Government provides the following assistance:-
BRITISH OLD AGED PENSIONER
(bearing in mind they worked hard and paid their Income Tax and N I contributions to the Government all their working life)
Weekly allowance: £106.00
IMMIGRANTS LIVING IN BRITAIN
(No Tax and N I contribution whatsoever)
Weekly allowance: £250.00
 OLD AGED PENSIONER
Weekly Spouse Allowance: £25.00
ILLEGAL IMMIGRANTS/REFUGEES LIVING IN BRITAIN
Weekly Spouse Allowance: £225.00
BRITISH OLD AGED PENSIONER
Additional Weekly Hardship Allowance: £0.00
ILLEGAL IMMIGRANTS LIVING IN BRITAIN
Additional Weekly Hardship Allowance: £100.00
OLD AGED PENSIONER
TOTAL YEARLY BENEFIT: £6,000
ILLEGAL IMMIGRANTS LIVING IN BRITAIN
TOTAL YEARLY BENEFIT: £29,900
